@chop007
Just be careful what you do, you could get yourself in a lot of trouble with targeting sites like those.
Hey chop. If you want to attack an agency that monitors your internet, maybe don't announce it on the internet. MORON.

This torrent is probably going to get multiple people arrested. The reason these programs aren't available to the public is because they don't know how to use them properly.
Uploading a torrent full of DDOS tools with no instructions about security or VPN's is a really bad idea. 
Not to mention most of these tools are out-dated and LOIC leads right back to your IP, even over VPN or TOR.
Ah, can't you see he's just trying to speed up the internet? With all those amatuer hackers sitting in prison, the net will be so traffic free.
Im really starting to think this was a bad idea :(
